refnamediv.refpurpose: 文字が7ビットUS-ASCII文字であるかどうかを確認する

listitem.para: 文字列または整数の配列.

refsection.title: 説明
refsection.para: res = isascii(str)は, strのエントリが 0および8進数表現で0177の間の7ビットUS-ASCII文字コード (またはstrのエントリが7ビットUS-ASCII文字列) の場合に%t (TRUE), それ以外の場合に %f (FALSE).

refsection.title: 例
refsection.programlisting:
isascii("Señor")
nt = ascii("Señor") isascii(nt)
t = "We know that γ² = 1/(1-β²)"; isascii(t) part(t, find(~isascii(t)))
refsection.screen:
--> isascii("Señor") ans = T T F T T
--> nt = ascii("Señor") nt = 83. 101. 195. 177. 111. 114.
--> isascii(nt) ans = T T F F T T
--> t = "We know that γ² = 1/(1-β²)"; --> isascii(t) ans = T T T T T T T T T T T T T F F T T T T T T T T F F T
--> part(t, find(~isascii(t))) ans = "γ²β²"
refsection.para: Tabs, New lines, etc are special but anyway US-ascii characters. Non-breakable spaces char(160) are not US-ascii:
refsection.programlisting: t = "a" + char(160) + "b" + ascii(9) + " EOL:" + ascii(10) + "Next" isascii(t) ascii(t)
refsection.screen:
--> t = "a" + char(160) + "b" + ascii(9) + " EOL:" + ascii(10) + "Next" t = "a b EOL: Next"
--> isascii(t) ans = T F T T T T T T T T T T T T
--> ascii(t) ans = 97. 194. 160. 98. 9. 32. 69. 79. 76. 58. 10. 78. 101. 120. 116.
